docs.title: Ziqi Zhou
docs.text: M.S. student at Department of Computer Science and Technology, Nanjing University, Nanjing, P.R.China. ## **Biography** Hi, I am Ziqi, a final year master student in computer science at Nanjing University advised by Prof. Yinghuan Shi. I received my B.Eng. degree in computer science in June 2020 from Nanjing Normal University, fortunately working with Prof. Wanqi Yang. ## **Main Research Interests** * Domain Adaptation & Generalization * Semantic Segmentation * Medical Image Analysis ## **Education** * `2020/09-Present` Department of Computer Science and Technology, Nanjing University, M.S. * `2016/09-2020/06` School of Computer and Electronic Information, Nanjing Normal University, B.Eng. ## **Working Experience** * `2022/06-2022/11` Research Intern at SenseTime, supervised by Wei Li. ## **Publications** "\*" indicates the equal contribution * Generalizable Medical Image Segmentation via Random Amplitude Mixup and Domain-Specific Image Restoration. **Ziqi Zhou**, Lei Qi, Yinghuan Shi. European Conference on Computer Vision (**ECCV**), 2022. :simple-adobeacrobatreader:{ .pdf } :simple-github:{ .github } * Generalizable Cross-modality Medical Image Segmentation via Style Augmentation and Dual Normalization. **Ziqi Zhou**, Lei Qi, Xin Yang, Dong Ni, Yinghuan Shi. IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (**CVPR**), 2022. :simple-adobeacrobatreader:{ .pdf } :simple-github:{ .github } * Deep Symmetric Adaptation Network for Cross-modality Medical Image Segmentation. Xiaoting Han, Lei Qi, Qian Yu, **Ziqi Zhou**, Yefeng Zheng, Yinghuan Shi, Yang Gao. IEEE Transactions on Medical Imaging (**TMI**), 2021. :simple-adobeacrobatreader:{ .pdf } :simple-github:{ .github } * Cross-Modal Attention-Guided Convolutional Network for Multi-Modal Cardiac Segmentation. **Ziqi Zhou**\*, Xinna Guo\*, Wanqi Yang, Yinghuan Shi, Luping Zhou, Lei Wang, Ming Yang. Machine Learning in Medical Imaging @ MICCAI (**MLMI**), 2019. :simple-adobeacrobatreader:{ .pdf } ## **Contest** * **$4^{th}$ Place**, The 8th CCF BDCI Remote Sensing Image Segmentation, 10,000 RMB Bonus, 2020. :link: ## **Award** * **National Scholarship**, Ministry of Education of P.R. China, 2022. ## **Services** * Reviewer for CVPR 2023, TMI, JBHI ---
